mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auser_detail( user_num, name, passwd_hash, email, group_name, intro, debut_date ) VALUES ( #{user_num}, #{name}, #{passwd_hash}, #{email}, #{group_name}, #{intro}, #{debut_date} )
mapper.select:
SELECT user_num, id, name, group_name, passwd_hash
FROM auser JOIN auser_detail USING (user_num) WHERE id= #{id}

SELECT * FROM agroup g JOIN auser_detail d ON g.group_name = d.group_name LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT follow_num,follower_num FROM follow WHERE follower_num=#{user_num}) c ON d.user_num=c.follow_num LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT follow_num,COUNT(*) follow_cnt FROM follow GROUP BY follow_num) cn ON d.user_num=cn.follow_num WHERE g.group_num=#{group_num}
